name: Storm Touch
description:
It's kind of like snooker, except you gotta smash the same colours together and the balls blow up when they touch. Some of them even set off explosions and chain reactions! Its a colour matching game where you do more than just swapping things.


Use a slingshot motion to launch one puzzle piece. Tap on screen to release a shockwave; affecting more than one at a time.


Relax and stroke your chin as you solve untimed, hand crafted, puzzles in Puzzle Mode. Race against the clock in Chaos Mode. Or test your skills against a friend in the local Versus Mode.

- 54 hand crafted puzzles
- 21 distinct puzzle pieces
- 6 "infinite" chaos levels
- 6 local multiplayer levels

Android version free: http://bit.ly/1Uu4PfM (ad supported)
